views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 to 13 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

ByeBreadcrumbs is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Get Rid of the Breadcrumbs on your StatusBar!

Breadcrumbs Appear at the Top of the Screen when navigating Between Different Apps in iOS!

If you don’t Like or don’t Need to Have the Breadcrumbs shown at the Top Left of the Screen, this Tweak Makes the Statusbar of your Devices Smoother and Cleaner!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository also Bringing arm64e/A12 Devices Support.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Thanks @DJSunnyBoyLP and @_024ka for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.3
- Updated for iOS 13 Compatibility.
- General iOS 13 Code Improvements.
